name: Inhabition
description:
Introducing Inhabition - a randomly generated dungeon crawler where you - a slime - takeover the bodies of other creatures. Use the XP you get from killing monsters to level them up, increasing their damage and health - which also makes you more powerful when inhabiting them.

Controls:

WASD to move

Hold E to inhabit

Left Click to attack

Additional Instructions:

  • You can only inhabit monsters when their health is below 25%
  • You have to go down down the stairs in one of the rooms to progress.
  • You need to be inhabiting a target (shown on the top right) to be allowed down the stairs.
  • You gain the max health, damage, and attack of the enemy you inhabit.
  • Your level and the XP you have gained towards your current level is shown at the bottom of the screen.
  • You can spend the levels you have gained after going down the stairs. This makes enemies stronger, but also makes you stronger when you inhabit them. Most importantly you get more XP and score for killing them.

Made for WGD Welcome Game Jam 2021/22
